text: Crew Dragon Resilience (Dragon C207) is a Crew Dragon spacecraft created by SpaceX and built under NASA's Commercial Crew Program (CCP). In November 2020, it was launched into orbit to the International Space Station (ISS) as part of the Crew-1 mission. With crew prompting, Resilience docked autonomously to the station at 04:01 UTC on Day 2 (17 November 2020) of the mission marking the first crewed operational flight of a Crew Dragon craft and the Commercial Crew Program. The mission carried four additional members of Expedition 64 to the three already on station. ==References== Category:SpaceX
title: Crew Dragon Resilience
